evidence.claim: RX2Live uses AWS infrastructure for cloud services.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure health data management.
RX2Live has integrated FHIR APIs for health data exchange.
RX2Live supports HL7 standards for interoperability in health tech.
They utilize AWS Lambda for serverless computing in their application.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of handling X12 transactions or relevant EDI use cases.
